original_text: God was kind to Ezra because Ezra had decided to study the law of the Lord. Ezra always obeyed its rules. He also taught the law and its rules to the Israelite people.
korean_text: 에스라가 여호와의 율법을 연구하여 준행하며 율례와 규례를 이스라엘에게 가르치기로 결심하였었더라

sentences.original_text: because Ezra had decided to study the law of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 에스라가 주의 율법을 연구하기로 결정했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: and its rules to the Israelite people
